meanings.definition: A type of sandwich originating from New Orleans, typically made with a round loaf of bread filled with various meats, cheeses, and olive salad.
meanings.sent1: I enjoyed a delicious muffaletta for lunch.
meanings.sent2: The muffaletta at the deli was packed with flavors.
meanings.sent3: When I bit into the muffaletta, the olive salad surprised me.
meanings.sent4: The muffaletta was a symphony of tastes in every bite.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of the muffaletta made my mouth water.

meanings.definition: The round loaf of bread used to make a muffaletta sandwich.
meanings.sent1: The bakery had fresh muffaletta ready for sale.
meanings.sent2: The muffaletta bread was crusty on the outside.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally squished the muffaletta while carrying it home.
meanings.sent4: The muffaletta bread was a fluffy cloud of goodness.
meanings.sent5: The smell of the warm muffaletta bread filled the kitchen.
